DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/gateway/lo.summary: Delete a Zero Trust Gateway location
x-api-token-group: Cloudflare Zero Trust Secure DNS Locations Write

GET /accounts/{account_id}/gateway/locat.description: List Zero Trust Gateway locations for an account.

success.description: Indicate whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Indicate the total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Indicate the current page within a paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Indicate the number of results per page.

total_count.description: Indicate the total results available without any search parameters.

client_default.description: Indicate whether this location is the default location.

dns_destination_ips_id.description: Indicate the identifier of the pair of IPv4 addresses assigned to this location.

dns_destination_ipv6_block_id.description: Specify the UUID of the IPv6 block brought to the gateway so that this location's IPv6 address is allocated from the Bring Your Own IPv6 (BYOIPv6) block rather than the standard Cloudflare IPv6 block.

doh_subdomain.description: Specify the DNS over HTTPS domain that receives DNS requests. Gateway automatically generates this value.

ecs_support.description: Indicate whether the location must resolve EDNS queries.

endpoints.description: Configure the destination endpoints for this location.

enabled.description: Indicate whether the DOH endpoint is enabled for this location.

networks.description: Specify the list of allowed source IP network ranges for this endpoint. When the list is empty, the endpoint allows all source IPs. The list takes effect only if the endpoint is enabled for this location.

network.description: Specify the IP address or IP CIDR.

require_token.description: Specify whether the DOH endpoint requires user identity authentication.

enabled.description: Indicate whether the DOT endpoint is enabled for this location.

networks.description: Specify the list of allowed source IP network ranges for this endpoint. When the list is empty, the endpoint allows all source IPs. The list takes effect only if the endpoint is enabled for this location.

network.description: Specify the IP address or IP CIDR.

enabled.description: Indicate whether the IPv4 endpoint is enabled for this location.
Indicate whether the IPV6 endpoint is enabled for this location.

networks.description: Specify the list of allowed source IPv6 network ranges for this endpoint. When the list is empty, the endpoint allows all source IPs. The list takes effect only if the endpoint is enabled for this location.

network.description: Specify the IPv6 address or IPv6 CIDR.

ip.description: Defines the automatically generated IPv6 destination IP assigned to this location. Gateway counts all DNS requests sent to this IP as requests under this location.

ipv4_destination.description: Show the primary destination IPv4 address from the pair identified dns_destination_ips_id. This field read-only.

ipv4_destination_backup.description: Show the backup destination IPv4 address from the pair identified dns_destination_ips_id. This field read-only.

networks.description: Specify the list of network ranges from which requests at this location originate. The list takes effect only if it is non-empty and the IPv4 endpoint is enabled for this location.

network.description: Specify the IPv4 address or IPv4 CIDR. Limit IPv4 CIDRs to a maximum of /24.

POST /accounts/{account_id}/gateway/loca.description: Create a new Zero Trust Gateway location.

client_default.description: Indicate whether this location is the default location.

dns_destination_ips_id.description: Specify the identifier of the pair of IPv4 addresses assigned to this location. When creating a location, if this field is absent or set to null, the pair of shared IPv4 addresses (0e4a32c6-6fb8-4858-9296-98f51631e8e6) is auto-assigned. When updating a location, if this field is absent or set to null, the pre-assigned pair remains unchanged.
